<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
<trait label="Composition" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=31" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 386 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283) or [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** You or an ally within 60 feet rolls a saving throw against an auditory or visual effect.

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 60-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Your performance protects you and your allies. Roll a Performance check for a type you know: an auditory performance if the trigger was auditory, or a visual one for a visual trigger. You and allies in the area can use the better result between your Performance check and the saving throw.
name: Counter Performance
